settings.heading: Privacy Policy
settings.row_content:
The types of personal information we obtain about you depends on how you interact with our Site and use our Services. When we use the term "personal information", we are referring to information that identifies, relates to, describes or can be associated with you. The following sections describe the categories and specific types of personal information we collect.

Information that you directly submit to us through our Services may include:

Basic contact details¬†including your name, address, phone number, email.

Order information¬†including your name, shipping address, payment confirmation, email address, phone number.

The information we collect is solely intended to provide an excellent shopping experience and to know to which address we send your order.

settings.heading: Shipping Policy
settings.row_content: Our shipping time is 10 to 15 days, including weekends and holidays, taking into account 2 days in advance in which the order is prepared and shipped. If you have any questions about shipping methods or shipping times, write to us at our email address violettarc @gmail.com

settings.heading: Refund Policy
settings.row_content: We have a 30-day return policy, which means you have 30 days after receiving your item to request a retun send a email to violettareccompany@gmail.com.To be eligible for a return, your item must be in the same condition that you received it, unworn or unused, with tags, and in its original packaging. You‚Äôll also need the receipt or proof of purchase.To start a return, you can contact us atviolettarccompany@gmail.com. We will notify you once we‚Äôve received and inspected your return, and let you know if the refund was approved or not. If approved, you‚Äôll be automatically refunded on your original payment method within 10 business days. Please remember it can take some time for your bank or credit card company to process and post the refund too.If more than 15 business days have passed since we‚Äôve approved your return, please contact us at violettarccompany@gmail.com.

settings.heading: Recommendations and frequently asked questions to give you the best shopping experience to Midi Dresses
settings.row_content:
Can I buy a midi dress to wear to the office?

Midi dresses are an excellent option for the work environment. Opt for solid colors and combine them with heels or closed shoes.

What type of prints are popular when buying a midi dress Floral, geometric and polka dot prints are trending in midi dresses. Choose one that reflects your personal style.

How can I give a casual touch to an elegant midi dress? Add a jean jacket, sneakers or flat sandals for a more relaxed look.

Are midi dresses suitable for all ages? Absolutely! Midi dresses are timeless and flatter women of all ages. Find the one that makes you feel comfortable and safe.

I hope this additional information helps you make an informed decision when purchasing your next midi dress. Enjoy your search! üõçÔ∏è‚ú®

settings.text:
What is a midi dress?
Its length falls at the bottom of the knee or mid-calf, making it perfect for looking elegant and sophisticated on any occasion.

When is it ideal to wear a midi dress? Midi dresses are versatile and adapt to various situations. You can wear them both day and night, at formal gatherings or for an outdoor picnic.

How to combine a midi dress? Combine your midi dress with accessories that highlight your beauty, such as earrings, necklaces and bracelets. Also, choose the right footwear according to the occasion.

What styles of midi dresses exist? Midi dresses can be plain, printed, textured, long or short sleeved. Explore different
